attributes.action: Propose that the next general election will elect a House of Commons and House of Lords by Proportional Representation and that he will ask the new Speaker to call a Speaker's Conference to decide on the voting system and that the next election will take place in six months time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have the chance to change our politics for the better. The public mood is for change. The Prime Minister has a majority and can commit the Government to pass anything a Speaker's Conference recommends.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
